Class PrivateMessages

java.lang.Object
database.repository.Repository<PrivateMessage>
database.repository.repos.PrivateMessages
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRepository<PrivateMessage>
public class PrivateMessages extends Repository<PrivateMessage>
Repository class for managing PrivateMessage entities in the database.

This class provides methods for performing CRUD operations on the "PrivateMessages" table, including creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting private messages. It also provides methods for retrieving replies to private messages or questions, and searching private messages by content.

Author:
Dhruv

    • update

      public PrivateMessage update(PrivateMessage pm) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Updates an existing private message in the "PrivateMessages" table.

      Validates the PrivateMessage entity before performing the update. If the associated message is updated, it is also updated in the "Messages" table.

      Specified by:
      update in interface IRepository<PrivateMessage>
      Overrides:
      update in class Repository<PrivateMessage>
      Parameters:
      pm - The PrivateMessage object containing the updated information.
      Returns:
      The updated PrivateMessage object if the update was successful, or null if no rows were affected.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the private message is invalid.

    • delete

      public void delete(int id)
      Deletes a private message from the "PrivateMessages" table by its ID.

      Only the private message is deleted; cascading delete for the associated message will occur if set in the DB.

      Specified by:
      delete in interface IRepository<PrivateMessage>
      Overrides:
      delete in class Repository<PrivateMessage>
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the private message to be deleted.

      Returns:

    • searchPrivateMessages

      public List<PrivateMessage> searchPrivateMessages(String keyword) throws Exception
      Performs a fuzzy search by content of the underlying message.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The search keyword to be matched in the message content.
      Returns:
      A list of PrivateMessage objects matching the search keyword.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the search operation.
